channel.title: Pdf readers
channel.description:
Okay so I am looking for a pdf reader that I can zoom in on and it won't mess up the width size. I have been using adobe but like let's say if I put stuff at 125% it would overlap and I have to scroll right to read.
Are there any that resize it automatically so you don't have to scroll left/right?

item.title: Pdf readers
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Hi t4,

I appreciate the wiki link. This is specifically for windows at the moment. I have tried the windows platform based ones in that. They all overlap like adobe acrobat.

I have attached the pdf so you can examine to see if it’s just the document and give further feedback

Read full topic

item.title: Pdf readers
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

uh it prob has something to do with the document. try: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_PDF_software#Viewers

Read full topic
